org.openimaj.math.model.fit.residuals

Interface ResidualCalculator<I,D,M extends Model<I,D>>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - type of independent data
    D - type of dependent data
    M - type of model
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractResidualCalculator, AlgebraicResidual2d, DistanceComparatorResidual, FundamentalModel.EpipolarResidual, FundamentalModel.Fundamental8PtResidual, FundamentalModel.SampsonGeometricResidual, SingleImageTransferResidual2d, SymmetricTransferResidual2d, TransformedSITR2d

    public interface ResidualCalculator<I,D,M extends Model<I,D>>
    Interface describing the computation of an error (the residuals) of a set of (independent and dependent) data points with respect to a model.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double computeResidual(IndependentPair<I,D> data)
      Compute the residual for a single point
      void computeResiduals(List<? extends IndependentPair<I,D>> data, double[] residuals)
      Compute the residual for a set of data points
      void setModel(M model)
      Set the current model being evaluated.

    • Method Detail

      • setModel

        void setModel(M model)
        Set the current model being evaluated. This should be called every time the model has changed internally, as the ResidualCalculator might pre-cache variables based on the model for error computation.
        Parameters:
        model - the model

      • computeResidual

        double computeResidual(IndependentPair<I,D> data)
        Compute the residual for a single point
        Parameters:
        data - the data
        Returns:
        the error

      • computeResiduals

        void computeResiduals(List<? extends IndependentPair<I,D>> data,
                    double[] residuals)
        Compute the residual for a set of data points
        Parameters:
        data - the data
        residuals - the array to write the residuals into
